name: Nora's Quest
description:
First game done only with the OLC - PixelGameEngine by OneLoneCoder.com

Submission to olc::BeatTheBoredom

Be kind :)

=========================================================

Nora has a power: she can make grass grow over barren soil. But this comes at a cost: the more she stands on soil, the worse she feels, until she faints and you lose the game. Can you help her overcome the wasteland and get to the end?

Control her with WASD keys, make grass grow with SPACEBAR, and keep an eye on Health and mana.
Or just download the source and make a mess: make her invincible or overpowered, or fix the wasteland and make it all a green field.
Nora is waiting for you, and the GPLv3 - OLC license of this game means you can so whatever you want with it -except claim it as your own-

Big thanks to Emma and Ren for their continued feedback during these early stages
